resources.string: \u2022Your operating system is the wrong version. Are you using an approved phone?\n
\u2022Disconnect from the WiFi network you\'re connected to\n
\u2022Make sure your WiFi Direct name is in the form ####-DS or ####-RC (for example, 9277-RC or 10650-DS)\n

\u2022Install all required apps. The Driver Station and Channel Changer can be installed from the Play Store. The Robot Controller app is installed from your programming computer. If you program in AppInventor, this app might show that you don\'t have the Robot Controller app installed when you actually do. If so, ignore this warning.\n
\nWe found errors, but we can try to fix some automatically. Would you like us to try?
